data.name: customSqlQuery1.Sql
data.value:
SELECT H.Code AS CODE, D.DESCRIPTION AS DEPARTMENT, H.EMPNO AS BUDGET, FORMAT(@Period1, 'MMM yyyy') AS PERIOD_1, FORMAT(@Period2, 'MMM yyyy') AS PERIOD_2,
-- New Staff ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HRStaffProfile P INNER JOIN HREmpCareer C ON P.EmpCode = C.EmpCode AND C.CareerCode = 'NEWJOIN' WHERE P.DEPT = H.Code AND MONTH(C.EffectDate) = MONTH(@Period1) AND YEAR(C.EffectDate) = YEAR(@Period1) AND P.Status = 'A' AND (@Branch IS NULL OR @Branch = '' OR P.Branch IN ( SELECT Code FROM HRBranch WHERE Code IN (SELECT Value FROM fn_Split(@Branch, ',')) )) ) AS NEW_STAFF_1,
-- Leaver ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HRStaffProfile P WHERE P.DEPT = H.Code AND MONTH(DATEADD(DAY, -1, P.DateTerminate)) = MONTH(@Period1) AND YEAR(DATEADD(DAY, -1, P.DateTerminate)) = YEAR(@Period1) AND P.Status = 'I' AND (@Branch IS NULL OR @Branch = '' OR P.Branch IN ( SELECT Code FROM HRBranch WHERE Code IN (SELECT Value FROM fn_Split(@Branch, ',')) )) ) AS LEAVER_1,
-- Plan Leaver (after Month1) ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HRStaffProfile P WHERE P.DEPT = H.Code AND DATEADD(DAY, -1, P.DateTerminate) > EOMONTH(@Period1) AND P.Status = 'I' AND (@Branch IS NULL OR @Branch = '' OR P.Branch IN ( SELECT Code FROM HRBranch WHERE Code IN (SELECT Value FROM fn_Split(@Branch, ',')) )) ) AS PLAN_LEAVER_1,
-- Staff Old (still active before start of Month1) ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HRStaffProfile P WHERE P.DEPT = H.Code AND P.StartDate <= EOMONTH(DATEADD(MONTH, -1, @Period1)) AND (P.DateTerminate IS NULL OR P.DateTerminate > EOMONTH(DATEADD(MONTH, -1, @Period1))) AND (@Branch IS NULL OR @Branch = '' OR P.Branch IN ( SELECT Code FROM HRBranch WHERE Code IN (SELECT Value FROM fn_Split(@Branch, ',')) )) ) AS STAFF_OLD_1,
-- Current Staff (still working in Month1) ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HRStaffProfile P WHERE P.DEPT = H.Code AND ( P.Status = 'A' OR (P.Status = 'I' AND DATEADD(DAY, -1, P.DateTerminate) >= DATEADD(DAY, 1 - DAY(@Period1), @Period1)) ) AND (@Branch IS NULL OR @Branch = '' OR P.Branch IN ( SELECT Code FROM HRBranch WHERE Code IN (SELECT Value FROM fn_Split(@Branch, ',')) )) ) AS CURRENT_STAFF_1, ------------------------ -- MONTH 2 METRICS ------------------------ ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HRStaffProfile P INNER JOIN HREmpCareer C ON P.EmpCode = C.EmpCode AND C.CareerCode = 'NEWJOIN' WHERE P.DEPT = H.Code AND MONTH(C.EffectDate) = MONTH(@Period2) AND YEAR(C.EffectDate) = YEAR(@Period2) AND P.Status = 'A' AND (@Branch IS NULL OR @Branch = '' OR P.Branch IN ( SELECT Code FROM HRBranch WHERE Code IN (SELECT Value FROM fn_Split(@Branch, ',')) )) ) AS NEW_STAFF_2,
( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HRStaffProfile P WHERE P.DEPT = H.Code AND MONTH(DATEADD(DAY, -1, P.DateTerminate)) = MONTH(@Period2) AND YEAR(DATEADD(DAY, -1, P.DateTerminate)) = YEAR(@Period2) AND P.Status = 'I' AND (@Branch IS NULL OR @Branch = '' OR P.Branch IN ( SELECT Code FROM HRBranch WHERE Code IN (SELECT Value FROM fn_Split(@Branch, ',')) )) ) AS LEAVER_2,
( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HRStaffProfile P WHERE P.DEPT = H.Code AND DATEADD(DAY, -1, P.DateTerminate) > EOMONTH(@Period2) AND P.Status = 'I' AND (@Branch IS NULL OR @Branch = '' OR P.Branch IN ( SELECT Code FROM HRBranch WHERE Code IN (SELECT Value FROM fn_Split(@Branch, ',')) )) ) AS PLAN_LEAVER_2,
( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HRStaffProfile P WHERE P.DEPT = H.Code AND P.StartDate <= EOMONTH(DATEADD(MONTH, -1, @Period2)) AND (P.DateTerminate IS NULL OR P.DateTerminate > EOMONTH(DATEADD(MONTH, -1, @Period2))) AND (@Branch IS NULL OR @Branch = '' OR P.Branch IN ( SELECT Code FROM HRBranch WHERE Code IN (SELECT Value FROM fn_Split(@Branch, ',')) )) ) AS STAFF_OLD_2,
( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HRStaffProfile P WHERE P.DEPT = H.Code AND ( P.Status = 'A' OR (P.Status = 'I' AND DATEADD(DAY, -1, P.DateTerminate) >= DATEADD(DAY, 1 - DAY(@Period2), @Period2)) ) AND (@Branch IS NULL OR @Branch = '' OR P.Branch IN ( SELECT Code FROM HRBranch WHERE Code IN (SELECT Value FROM fn_Split(@Branch, ',')) )) ) AS CURRENT_STAFF_2
FROM HRHeadCount H INNER JOIN HRDepartment D ON D.Code = H.Code WHERE D.IsActive = 1 ORDER BY D.SortKey;
